stem: Which statement best describes a key anatomical feature of the endocrine system?
choices: It primarily regulates hormone secretion
It facilitates transport or structural support specific to its system
It is responsible for voluntary muscle contraction only
It functions independently of other body systems
answer: It facilitates transport or structural support specific to its system
rationale: The endocrine system has specialized anatomical structures that support its primary physiologic role.
